original_text: And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand of every tribe, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the war, with the holy instruments, and the trumpets to blow in his hand.
korean_text: 모세가 각 지파에 천 명씩 싸움에 보내되 제사장 엘르아살의 아들 비느하스에게 성소의 기구와 신호 나팔을 들려서 그들과 함께 전쟁에 보내매

sentences.original_text: And Moses sent them to the war
them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest
and the trumpets to blow in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에 들고 불 나팔들과 함께
